lost-stolen-abroad.header: Thank you for reporting that your biometric residence permit (BRP) has been lost or stolen. We will now cancel your BRP and it can’t be reactivated.
lost-stolen-abroad.subheading: If you find your BRP you must return it to the address below as soon as possible:
lost-stolen-abroad.paragraph-one: To return to the UK you must apply for a replacement BRP visa. Details are available at on the GOV.UK website.
lost-stolen-abroad.paragraph-two: You should not make arrangements to travel back to the UK until you receive your replacement BRP visa.
lost-stolen-abroad.paragraph-three: This office can’t help you with the Replacement BRP Visa application process and won’t respond to enquiries.
lost-stolen-abroad.paragraph-four: Don’t reply to this email for support regarding your replacement BRP visa. Instead, you should direct enquiries to your local Visa Application Centre.
lost-stolen-abroad.paragraph-five: After returning to the UK, you’ll need to apply for a replacement BRP.
lost-stolen-abroad.header-three: When you return to the UK
lost-stolen-abroad.paragraph-six: When you return to the UK, you must apply for a replacement BRP within 3 months. If you don’t you may:

paragraph-six-bullets.one: receive a fine of up to £1,000
paragraph-six-bullets.two: have your permission to stay in UK taken away

lost-stolen-abroad.paragraph-seven: Guidance and the application form can be found on the GOV.UK website
lost-stolen-abroad.paragraph-eight: We aim to consider applications for a replacement BRP within:

paragraph-eight-bullets.one: eight weeks of receipt if you hold limited leave to enter or remain
paragraph-eight-bullets.two: six months of receipt if you hold indefinite leave to enter or remain

lost-stolen-abroad.paragraph-nine: If you require a replacement BRP urgently, you can book an appointment to apply in person at a Premium Service Centre.
lost-stolen-abroad.paragraph-ten: You need a BRP to enter the UK but not to leave.
lost-stolen-abroad.paragraph-eleven: If you submit a replacement BRP application and then find that you need to travel urgently you must either:

paragraph-eleven-bullets.one: withdraw the application and make a new one at a Premium Service Centre
paragraph-eleven-bullets.two: or leave the UK and then apply for a replacement BRP visa at a Visa Application Centre while you’re overseas
